doc.field: Series XIV. Newspapers, Clippings and Reprints, 1860-1907, undated
Series XIV. Newspapers, Clippings and Reprints, 1860-1907, undated

Contains newspapers and clippings, mostly from upstate New York publications, many of which contain articles by Samuel Ludlow Frey. Also reprints of articles, most from the Utica Morning Herald, regarding Samuel Ludlow Frey, his interests, and the Oneida Historical Society.
